channel.title: Alternate Color-Randomness Solution
channel.description:
I'm feeling generous. Instead of removeing the randomness that can lead to detectability try looking at the colors in a differnt way. Look at them dumber.
[img]http://www.impsoft.net/files/map%2016.PNG[/img] [img]http://www.impsoft.net/files/Falador%2016.PNG[/img] NOTE: larger Falador map is outdated + Too Dirty for a color reference
Analzying the map in 16 bit or 256 bit modes cuts off nearly all ways that Runegay can mess with this color randomness.
We(IMPSoft) are integrating this and may new color anylzation ways. have fun comment inicial thread @ impsoft ( http://www.impsoft.net/viewtopic.php?t=82 )

item.title: Alternate Color-Randomness Solution
item.dc:creator: @GenoDemoN GenoDemoN
item.description:
@GenoDemoN wrote:

sdobule if you feel so mcuh that way you should just let the post die all of you guys are just giving our "spam" and "advertisements" free bumps if no-1 cared they'd jsut drop off the first page and our of the public's eyes due to inactivity.

and we post what were doing to help grow our forum's activity yes, thats how every single forum grows.
think about it like this:
ECG forced --> Bovine Labs
Bovine Labs forced --> old RSCN
FGF leeched --> Runecms
old RSCN forced --> last RSCN
Runecms forced --> last RSCN
FGF & Runecms leeched --> Sythe
Sythe leeched --> Fagex.net
last RSCN leeched --> Reinet.co.uk, Scripdump.us/net, scrablabs, RS2CN(RSCN2 by odie)
old / last RSCN, Runecms leeched --> Kait
Kait leeched --> IMPSoft
Kait forced --> Autorune.co.uk
Autorune.co.uk leeched --> rs-resources, lukeidiot
Sythe leech/promoted --> dcthugs's site
autoscam, Sythe, Fagex leeched --> Moparisthebest IMPSoft
Fagex.net (temp force by defacement) --> IMPSoft
IMPSoft leeched/promoted --> thefreeweed.com

You kill advertisement and promoteing of new stuff from toher forums you will kill the communities they survive by having a new leading community ever so often. Kait's was the longest every running with new technologies Sythe has been decaying for a looong time it will die cause nearly all the active members scammers & are being banned and are getting tired of that site so now they will move elsewhere like here.

I never started a flame war with any of you. I've never wroung any of you. Your flames have no bearing nor facts to back up your statements & requests. So you guys should shut up till you have some basis upon your replies.

Read full topic

item.title: Alternate Color-Randomness Solution
item.dc:creator: @sdouble sdouble
item.description:
@sdouble wrote:

To be honest, why does impsoft bother coming to this forum? You have your own. Well, I guess by coming here and advertising what's going on with impsoft is a good eough reason. It just seems that everyone hates you and wants you to go away. If I were you, I just wouldn't revisit the site. There's really no point except the standard "We did/can do this, read about it here: http://www.imps.... "

Just visit the forum, drop your spam and go elsewhere. If I was in your situation, that's exactly what I'd do, minus the spam droppage. I personally, wouldn't want to go to a forum somewhere just to be attacked repeatedly.

Read full topic
